programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Summer Games / Paddington Goes Camping) S1 (16/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Summer Games / Paddington Goes Camping»The Browns are having their annual summer games. Will Paddington be good at any of them? // Mrs. Brown has bought an old camper van and decides to take the family on a camping holiday.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Fundraiser Day / Paddington's Alien Adventure) S1 (18/33)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Fundraiser Day / Paddington's Alien Adventure»The town hall is leaking and needs a new roof, and Paddington must stay silent to raise the money. // Will the strange radio messages Jonathan is receiving mean visitors are arriving from another world? Paddington forms a greeting committee!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le camping-car) S3 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Le camping-car»Peppa and her family go on vacation in a special van. Peppa is surprised to find that at a push of a button the van converts into a mini-house for them to sleep in!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Vacances en camping-car) S3 (6/52)
programme.desc: «Vacances en camping-car»Peppa and her family go camping, but Daddy Pig is too big to get into the tent. Daddy Pig likes sleeping under the stars, until it starts to rain.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le compost) S3 (7/52)
programme.desc: «Le compost»Peppa and George take a bin of vegetable peelings to Grandpa Pig's compost heap. Worms inside the bin turn the peelings into compost, which Granny and Grandpa use to help their plants grow.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Richard Rabbit vient jouer à la maison) S3 (8/52)
programme.desc: «Richard Rabbit vient jouer à la maison»Richard Rabbit comes to play with George, and Suzy Sheep comes to play with Peppa! The boys and girls don't want to play the same games, but they all like jumping up and down in muddy puddles.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (La compétichien de sports d'hiver) S6 (n°606)
programme.desc: «La compétichien de sports d'hiver»Gil and Bubble Puppy are competing in the Winter Sports Chompetition--a competition for athletes and their dogs! Will they be able to stop reigning champs Coldsnap and his dog Mr. Husky from cheating to win the gold?

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (La photo-souvenir de Gingembre et Sauge) S4 (n°3)
programme.desc: «La photo-souvenir de Gingembre et Sauge»Mr. Salt and Mrs. Pepper are trying to take a photo of Sage and Ginger for their baby book, but they just can't seem to make the twins smile. We'll play a silly game of Blue's Clues to figure out how to make the twins giggle!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Le Grand Joshini) S4 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Le Grand Joshini»Periwinkle is planning a magic show! The Amazing Joshini and YOU, are eager to perform the greatest magic trick the Blue's Clues house has ever seen! But which one? We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out.

programme.title: Santiago des mers (The Treasure in the Sky / Sidekick Switcheroo) S1 (n°7)
programme.desc: «The Treasure in the Sky / Sidekick Switcheroo»After finding a cosmic treasure map, Santiago and crew take to the stars to track the treasure down. // During a high seas scuffle, Kiko and Sir Butterscotch swap places!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Bonnie's Mom) S2 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Bonnie's Mom»Bonnie's Mom: Santi and crew must team up with Bonnie to rescue her mom, pirate Billie Bones, from her sneaky first mate! (S2, ep 7a).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le mot de passe secret) S2 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Le mot de passe secret»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Captain Varech) S1 (n°11)
programme.desc: «Captain Varech»Captain Kelp: As Super Shark and Captain Kelp, Baby Shark and William set out to save playtime-but is Captain Kelp just a sidekick? (S1, ep 9a).

programme.title: Mini Chef (Bread) S1 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Bread»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Trisha sème la pagaille) S8 (4/26)
programme.desc: «Trisha sème la pagaille»When the Cheetah swipes the Paw Patroller to fulfill her nefarious plan to destroy the jungle and build the cheating-est racetrack ever, the Paw Patrol must get a brand vehicle and stop her!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington recycle) S2 (10/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington recycle»Paddington the Upcycler: Baaz teaches Jonathan & Paddington about upcycling but can the pair create something to earn a reward. (S2, ep 10b).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les petites bêtes) S2 (21/52)
programme.desc: «Les petites bêtes»Papy Cochon montre son jardin à Peppa et George. Il y a plein de minuscules bestioles à regarder...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Jour de sport) S2 (15/52)
programme.desc: «Jour de sport»C'est jour de fête à la garderie et de nombreuses animations ont été organisées pour l'occasion. Papa Pig enseigne à Peppa que l'important n'est pas de gagner mais de participer...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le garage de Papy Dog) S2 (17/52)
programme.desc: «Le garage de Papy Dog»Papa Pig s'aperçoit qu'il n'a presque plus d'essence dans le réservoir de sa voiture. Heureusement, la station service tenue par Grand-Père Dog n'est pas loin...

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Collection) S1 (19/78)
programme.desc: «The Collection»The Collection: Upon seeing Ron's stick collection, Froga learns for the first time what "a collection" is. Anna would like to create one of her own. (S1, ep 19).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Fixing Things) S1 (20/78)
programme.desc: «Fixing Things»Bubu catches a cold, he's unable to fix Ron's spinning top and Christopher's broken piano. While Bubu is resting, she "fixes" the broken items for him. Christopher's piano starts playing bubbles, Froga realizes she should leave the fixing to Bubu.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Du nouveau à l'école de Blue) S3 (17/18)
programme.desc: «Du nouveau à l'école de Blue»Join Josh and Blue at school for a day of trying new things! Josh is excited to try being Teacher for the Day, but Blue seems nervous to try something. What could it be?

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (La moustache de Monsieur Hellinger / La fête foraine) S8 (5/26)
programme.desc: «La moustache de Monsieur Hellinger / La fête foraine»The Pups must help to find Mayor Humdinger's mustache after he accidentally shaves it off before it's about to be on the cover of a magazine. // When a carnival train gets stuck in a tunnel, it results in a mountainside funhouse-style wild ride.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Pups Save Jake) S2 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Pups Save Jake»Jake and Chase go deep cave spelunking when Jake ends up getting his ankle stuck between some fallen rocks!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le Numéro de voltige de Lola / Le Monstre des égouts) S1 (n°17)
programme.desc: «Le Numéro de voltige de Lola / Le Monstre des égouts»Lola is worried her air display will not be impressive enough, but when Sir Steel joins, the air display goes wrong in a spectacular way! // When Sir Steel's dog Muffin's ball goes missing down the sewers, Bobbi has to face his fear of the dark.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Le parc au trésor / À pas de géant) S2 (n°215)
programme.desc: «Le parc au trésor / À pas de géant»Bobbi and Jade find an underground cavern in 'Treasure Park', and then in 'Baddy Long Legs', Rammy is so focused on meditation that he fails to focus on a real crisis! (S2, ep 15).

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Bone / Paddington Joins a Band) S1 (17/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Bone / Paddington Joins a Band»Mr. Gruber has been loaned a T-Rex Skeleton, but Lucky the dog has stolen the priceless bone and buried it somewhere. // The kids decide to form a rock band with Paddington, but what instrument should he play, and what is rock music?

programme.title: Mini Chef (Guacamole) S1 (n°12)
programme.desc: «Guacamole»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (L'océan fuchsia / Zéro déchet) S1 (n°15)
programme.desc: «L'océan fuchsia / Zéro déchet»Chemical sprays are making the countryside rosy! The Barbapapas' build an aviary to protect sick birds. // When they see a beach covered with rubbish, the Barbapapa family decides to clean the beach and use the trash to make a miniature golf course.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Hiccupism / Silence please) S1 (32/52)
programme.desc: «Hiccupism / Silence please»Barbabeau can't paint. He has a hiccup he can't get rid of. Just when he's about to give up, he accidentally creates a new artistic movement. // Barbalib wants to compete in a writing contest but his brothers and sisters stop her from concentrating.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Baby Shark, le maire / Coule ou flotte) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Baby Shark, le maire / Coule ou flotte»The fate of the city's squidapple supply lies in Baby's fins when he accidentally assumes the role of Mayor on a big day. // The Sharks go on the family game show Sink or Swim and find they're in hot water with their competition, the Fishes.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Daddy Shack) S1 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Daddy Shack»Daddy Shack: After a selfish fish takes over the putt-putt, Baby Shark and William must find a champion mini-golf player to defeat him. (S1, ep 12a).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Hide and Seek) S1 (16/78)
programme.desc: «Hide and Seek»Anna and her friends are outside playing Ron's favorite game, Hide-and-Seek! Anna is the Seeker and quickly finds Froga, Christopher and Bubu. When the friends work together to try to find Ron, they realize he's found the best hiding spot of all.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Swing) S1 (n°2)
programme.desc: «The Swing»When Anna and Froga discover the old seat of their swing, they are excited to hang it on the apple tree. But the ropes to attach it have gone missing!The two friends' search for the missing ropes turns out to be more difficult than they had imagined!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Photo) S1 (5/78)
programme.desc: «The Photo»Polaroid camera, she decides to take pictures of all her friends. Everyone thinks it's a great idea and Anna makes some great portraits. But things get complicated when she tries to take a group shot of everyone!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Bicycle) S1 (9/78)
programme.desc: «The Bicycle»Bubu impresses his friends with a brand new bike he won in a contest. He encourages everyone else to ride it, Anna discovers why: Bubu doesn't know how to ride a two-wheeler!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Mosquito) S1 (12/78)
programme.desc: «The Mosquito»Froga is petrified of a pesky mosquito, so her friends try everything they can think of to chase it away: they dance, fidget, make loud noises and even try to befriend it. When Bubu activates his homemade stink bomb launcher, it causes such a stink!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Froga's Hat) S1 (29/78)
programme.desc: «Froga's Hat»Froga finds a sun hat she thought she lost forever and organizes a celebration picnic! But when the precious hat gets stained with jam, Froga's friends try to fix it - only making things worse. In the end, Anna's solution is the best of all.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le voyage en montgolfière) S2 (25/52)
programme.desc: «Le voyage en montgolfière»Peppa and her family are at the school fête. The top prize in the raffle is a trip in a Hot Air Balloon. Peppa wins! Mummy Pig, Daddy Pig, George and Peppa climb into the balloon. Everyone enjoys the flight until the balloon gets caught in a tree. Luckily, the balloon has landed in a very familiar garden.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Georges attrape un rhume) S2 (24/52)
programme.desc: «Georges attrape un rhume»Peppa wins a ride in Miss Rabbit's hot air balloon and the whole family comes along. Peppa drops Teddy and Papa Pig saves him. But if they get stuck in a tree, who will come and save them?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'examen de la vue) S2 (16/52)
programme.desc: «L'examen de la vue»Peppa's friend Pedro wears glasses. In addition, his father is an optician, so Pedro knows everything about glasses and eyes. According to Pedro, Peppa absolutely needs glasses. To see if that is really the case, Peppa can go to the optician ...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Betsy la tondeuse) S2 (27/52)
programme.desc: «Betsy la tondeuse»Papa Pig waited a long time to mow the lawn. It's fun to play in at first, but when Peppa and George loose their ball in it, they call Grandpa Pig. And Betsy, the super lawn mower, will take that!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le voyage sur la Lune) S3 (21/52)
programme.desc: «Le voyage sur la Lune»Peppa et George partent avec maman Cochon à la présentation par mademoiselle Lapin du camion des mamans sapeurs pompiers...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Grand-père à l'aire de jeux) S3 (22/52)
programme.desc: «Grand-père à l'aire de jeux»Papa Pig perd son titre de Champion de saut de flaques durant les Papa-Olympics. Tout le monde l'aide à s'entraîner en vue des prochains Papa-Olympics...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Goldie, le poisson rouge) S3 (23/52)
programme.desc: «Goldie, le poisson rouge»Goldie le poisson n'a pas l'air heureux et ne mange pas sa nourriture, alors Peppa, George et Maman Cochon l'emmènent faire un tour en bus pour voir le docteur Hamster, le vétérinaire...

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (The Competition Prize) S1 (n°8)
programme.desc: «The Competition Prize»The Barbabies win a touchpad. They all want to use it and snaffle it one after another.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Pour maman / Barbacarambolage) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Pour maman / Barbacarambolage»The barbababies prepare a show for Barbamama's birthday. While Barbalala finishes up, they go to the carnival where Barbabeau gets stuck in an attraction. // Three separate stories telescope into a big final bouquet in the middle of the courtyard.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Les T-Rex égarés) S4 (7/20)
programme.desc: «Les T-Rex égarés»Blaze and Zeg are in Dinosaur Valley, showing off their amazing robot powers to their dinosaur friends. But when they discover three lost little Tyrannosauruses, they must use their robot powers to get the babies home safely.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Animal Island) S3 (9/20)
programme.desc: «Animal Island»Lazard steals their special animal power from all the animals on Animal Island. Lazard does this because he himself has no special strength. At least; he thinks so.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Le maire en chocolat / Wendini la magicienne) S8 (2/26)
programme.desc: «Le maire en chocolat / Wendini la magicienne»Encased in a huge chocolate bunny, Humdinger is carried away by hungry raccoons and ends up floating in Adventure Bay with a curious dolphin. // When a magic trick goes awry, the Adventure Bay Easter Festival is overrun by wild bunnies.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Ruben l'extraterrestre / L'anniversaire d'Alex) S8 (3/26)
programme.desc: «Ruben l'extraterrestre / L'anniversaire d'Alex»Rubble dreams that he's been taken aboard a spaceship and meets his alien double. When the ship crashes on an alien planet, he needs help.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La roue de Métal / Le bongo de Bobbi) S2 (16/20)
programme.desc: «La roue de Métal / Le bongo de Bobbi»When Bobbi and Jade find an underground cavern, they end up in danger when Sir Steel goes treasure hunting!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Catastrophe de chantier) S2 (n°19)
programme.desc: «Catastrophe de chantier»Kai tries to impress with his super den, but his leaf blower invention frightens the baby animals.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Summer Games / Paddington Goes Camping) S1 (16/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Summer Games / Paddington Goes Camping»The Browns are having their annual summer games. Will Paddington be good at any of them? // Mrs. Brown has bought an old camper van and decides to take the family on a camping holiday.

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington and the Fundraiser Day / Paddington's Alien Adventure) S1 (18/33)
programme.desc: «Paddington and the Fundraiser Day / Paddington's Alien Adventure»The town hall is leaking and needs a new roof, and Paddington must stay silent to raise the money. // Will the strange radio messages Jonathan is receiving mean visitors are arriving from another world? Paddington forms a greeting committee!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le camping-car) S3 (5/52)
programme.desc: «Le camping-car»Peppa and her family go on vacation in a special van. Peppa is surprised to find that at a push of a button the van converts into a mini-house for them to sleep in!

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Vacances en camping-car) S3 (6/52)
programme.desc: «Vacances en camping-car»Peppa and her family go camping, but Daddy Pig is too big to get into the tent. Daddy Pig likes sleeping under the stars, until it starts to rain.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le compost) S3 (7/52)
programme.desc: «Le compost»Peppa and George take a bin of vegetable peelings to Grandpa Pig's compost heap. Worms inside the bin turn the peelings into compost, which Granny and Grandpa use to help their plants grow.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Richard Rabbit vient jouer à la maison) S3 (8/52)
programme.desc: «Richard Rabbit vient jouer à la maison»Richard Rabbit comes to play with George, and Suzy Sheep comes to play with Peppa! The boys and girls don't want to play the same games, but they all like jumping up and down in muddy puddles.

programme.title: Bubulle Guppies (La compétichien de sports d'hiver) S6 (n°606)
programme.desc: «La compétichien de sports d'hiver»Gil and Bubble Puppy are competing in the Winter Sports Chompetition--a competition for athletes and their dogs! Will they be able to stop reigning champs Coldsnap and his dog Mr. Husky from cheating to win the gold?

programme.desc: «La photo-souvenir de Gingembre et Sauge»Mr. Salt and Mrs. Pepper are trying to take a photo of Sage and Ginger for their baby book, but they just can't seem to make the twins smile. We'll play a silly game of Blue's Clues to figure out how to make the twins giggle!

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Le Grand Joshini) S4 (n°4)
programme.desc: «Le Grand Joshini»Periwinkle is planning a magic show! The Amazing Joshini and YOU, are eager to perform the greatest magic trick the Blue's Clues house has ever seen! But which one? We'll play Blue's Clues to figure it out.

programme.desc: «The Treasure in the Sky / Sidekick Switcheroo»After finding a cosmic treasure map, Santiago and crew take to the stars to track the treasure down. // During a high seas scuffle, Kiko and Sir Butterscotch swap places!

programme.title: Santiago des mers (Bonnie's Mom) S2 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Bonnie's Mom»Bonnie's Mom: Santi and crew must team up with Bonnie to rescue her mom, pirate Billie Bones, from her sneaky first mate! (S2, ep 7a).

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le mot de passe secret) S2 (n°3)
programme.desc: «Le mot de passe secret»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Captain Varech) S1 (n°11)
programme.desc: «Captain Varech»Captain Kelp: As Super Shark and Captain Kelp, Baby Shark and William set out to save playtime-but is Captain Kelp just a sidekick? (S1, ep 9a).

programme.title: Mini Chef (Bread) S1 (n°1)
programme.desc: «Bread»Tiny Chef hosts his own tiny cooking show, and with his best friends Olly, Ruby and Henry, cooks up tasty dishes and amazing adventures, putting love into every dish he makes.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Trisha sème la pagaille) S8 (4/26)
programme.desc: «Trisha sème la pagaille»When the Cheetah swipes the Paw Patroller to fulfill her nefarious plan to destroy the jungle and build the cheating-est racetrack ever, the Paw Patrol must get a brand vehicle and stop her!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington recycle) S2 (10/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington recycle»Paddington the Upcycler: Baaz teaches Jonathan & Paddington about upcycling but can the pair create something to earn a reward. (S2, ep 10b).

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le patin à glace) S2 (34/52)
programme.desc: «Le patin à glace»When Peppa's friends come to play in her tree house, it's super fun, but when the boys come, things go wrong. Peppa unceremoniously puts them out. Grandpa knows what to do and builds a castle hut for the boys, but whether it makes it more fun?

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Chez le dentiste) S2 (35/52)
programme.desc: «Chez le dentiste»Peppa has been to the dentist before, but for George it is the first time. And that's scary.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Grandpa's Kids Train To the Rescue) S4 (20/52)
programme.desc: «Grandpa's Kids Train To the Rescue»Grandpa Big made a train! He is sure that it is the strongest little train in the world, but Grandpa Hond thinks that is nonsense. Until Miss Rabbit's bus gets stuck in the mud.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Prank Day) S1 (23/78)
programme.desc: «Prank Day»Prank Day: Today is Prank day, Anna and her friends must compete to elect the best prankster of all. Everyone's doing a great except Christopher, or so it seems. (S1, ep 23).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (A Present for Ron) S1 (24/78)
programme.desc: «A Present for Ron»Christopher loves Ron's rock collection so much, he wants to add another beautiful rock to it! They set off on a journey to find the most amazing rock they can find. When they discover it - they must figure out a creative solution to get it to Ron!

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Making Bread / From One Pit to Another) S1 (4/52)
programme.desc: «Making Bread / From One Pit to Another»Barbapapa wants to teach his children to make bread, but things don't go as planned... // The Barbababies plant an avocado tree. However, it takes years before the first harvest. Barbabright has an idea to save time that may well lead to...disaster.

programme.title: Blue et ses amis (Feelin' Filipino) S3 (18/18)
programme.desc: «Feelin' Filipino»Lola is missing her hometown in the Philippines, so Josh surprises her by bringing the Philippines to the house! We explore Filipino culture and family traditions as we play Blue's Clues.

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Katie rejoint la Pat'patrouille / Les poiossons-pattes) S8 (10/24)
programme.desc: «Katie rejoint la Pat'patrouille / Les poiossons-pattes»When Mayor Humdinger disrupts Adventure Bay with his "barking" kitties, Katie and the pups must rescue the town.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La roue de Métal / Le bongo de Bobbi) S2 (16/20)
programme.desc: «La roue de Métal / Le bongo de Bobbi»When Bobbi and Jade find an underground cavern, they end up in danger when Sir Steel goes treasure hunting!

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (La fontaine mystérieuse / La soirée des lumières disco) S2 (n°17)
programme.desc: «La fontaine mystérieuse / La soirée des lumières disco»Who has put a new fountain in Crystal Lake which is against Park Rules? And it's upsetting Fish Hook! // Sir Steel thinks the deer have stolen Steel Tower's lights, so decides to take theirs with his new Light Sucker!

programme.title: Les aventures de Paddington (Paddington Builds a Scarecrow / Paddington Plays Hide and Seek) S1 (27/27)
programme.desc: «Paddington Builds a Scarecrow / Paddington Plays Hide and Seek»Paddington accidentally ruins Mr. Browns lovely lawn and must repair it. But the birds take a liking to the seeds so he builds a Scarecrow. // Mrs. Bird is a champion hide and seeker but where is she? Paddington, Jonathan and Judy mus go find her.

programme.title: Mini Chef (Quesadillas) S1 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Quesadillas»Quesadillas: Tiny Chef makes quesadillas but can't get his favourite jar of salsa open, no matter how hard he and his friends try! (S1, ep 7b).

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen) S1 (8/52)
programme.desc: «Where Did It Go Barbabravo? / The Big Bad Hen»Like a secret agent, Barbabravo leads the investigation equipped with his gadgets to find out who stole Barbapapa's cake. // Barbalala is convinced she heard a giant hen prowling around the house. The Barbababies organize themselves to stand guard.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Pour maman / Barbacarambolage) S1 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Pour maman / Barbacarambolage»The barbababies prepare a show for Barbamama's birthday. While Barbalala finishes up, they go to the carnival where Barbabeau gets stuck in an attraction. // Three separate stories telescope into a big final bouquet in the middle of the courtyard.

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Captain Varech / Riquiqui le Tardigrade) S1 (n°9)
programme.desc: «Captain Varech / Riquiqui le Tardigrade»As Super Shark and Captain Kelp, Baby Shark and William set out to save playtime-but is Captain Kelp just a sidekick? // Baby Shark adopts a teensy tiny pet, but is he ready for a big responsibility?

programme.title: Baby Shark : l'aventure sous l'eau (Le Sorcier Glacé) S2 (n°2)
programme.desc: «Le Sorcier Glacé»A brash young Baby Shark puts the life skills he learns from his parents to the test in his own backyard - which just happens to be the ocean!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Party Time) S1 (22/78)
programme.desc: «Party Time»Anna and Froga want to throw a party..... since it is not a particular party day they decide to celebrate "Tomato Day", But Christopher ate all of the tomatoes ... so they need to find another name... Anna finds the perfect name: Friendship party!

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Squeaky Boots) S1 (n°66)
programme.desc: «The Squeaky Boots»The Squeaky Boots: Christopher leads the friends in a fun game of hide and seek, but Froga soon realizes that her new boots are letting out a noisy squeak! (S1, ep 66).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (A Longchair for Ron) S1 (n°68)
programme.desc: «A Longchair for Ron»A sleeping spider squats Ron's swing, and he can't take a nap. He laments to Anna and Froga that he wishes he had a deck chair to sleep on. This gives them the idea to surprise him with one.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (Bubu's New Blue Jeans) S1 (n°71)
programme.desc: «Bubu's New Blue Jeans»Christopher has prepared his annual obstacle race and is excited for all the friends to participate. Bubu's new blue jeans are still drying so he has to wear his brand-new pair to the event, he becomes overly concerned of getting them dirty.

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Blue Butterfly) S1 (n°73)
programme.desc: «The Blue Butterfly»The Blue Butterfly: Anna and her friends are on a mission to capture a photograph of a pretty flower, but on the search, they see a beautiful blue butterfly. (S1, ep 73).

programme.title: Anna et ses amis (The Quiet Game) S1 (n°76)
programme.desc: «The Quiet Game»After talking so much to her plants, Froga decides to save her voice by playing THE QUIET GAME. When she lays out the objective that her friends need to try to make her talk - it becomes a fun challenge for the gang to get her to crack.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Alexandre le petit cousin) S2 (31/52)
programme.desc: «Alexandre le petit cousin»Peppa and George's aunt and uncle have a baby and the whole family is visiting. Expectations are high, but the baby cannot do anything yet. Then Peppa and niece Chloe decide that George could also be a very nice baby ...

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le sentier de randonnée) S2 (40/52)
programme.desc: «Le sentier de randonnée»Suzie Sheep comes to play at Peppa's, together with her invisible friend Leo de Leeuw. Peppa has to get used to it, but soon she is playing Suzie's game, just like Papa and Mama Pig. Only George finds it difficult.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (L'ami imaginaire) S2 (37/52)
programme.desc: «L'ami imaginaire»Suzy Sheep has come to play with Peppa. Suzy has made up a pretend friend called "Leo Lion". Peppa cannot see Leo but Suzy announces that Leo likes roaring and he likes playing dressing up. Peppa decides that now she can see Leo. Even Mummy and Daddy Pig play along with the game. But Peppa's little brother George cannot see Leo and feels a bit left out.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Le correspondant) S2 (41/52)
programme.desc: «Le correspondant»Peppa and George are visiting their big cousin Chloé and her new baby brother, Alexander. Baby Alexander is too little to play games, but Peppa and Chloé have a great idea;.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (La fête foraine) S3 (24/52)
programme.desc: «La fête foraine»La famille va à la fête foraine, mais maman Cochon est en colère quand les gens à la foire lui disent qu'elle ne sera pas en mesure de gagner les prix en compétition.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Les chiffres) S3 (25/52)
programme.desc: «Les chiffres»C'est l'anniversaire de Peppa. Tous ses amis sont invités à la fête. Papa Cochon s'apprête à faire un show extraordinaire pour l'occasion.

programme.title: Peppa Pig (Un trou dans la route) S3 (26/52)
programme.desc: «Un trou dans la route»Peppa and her family are trying to get to the playground, but Mr Bull's roadworks are in the way.

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Marvelous Moustaches) S1 (21/52)
programme.desc: «Marvelous Moustaches»Barbazoo collects photos of moustached celebrities. Unfortunately, it's impossible to find the last one: Charles Horseshoe-Furlip. He suspects a conspiracy...

programme.title: Barbapapa *2019 (Histoire de relais / Le monde des barbabébés) S1 (11/52)
programme.desc: «Histoire de relais / Le monde des barbabébés»Barbalib, Barbalala and Barbabelle take turns as narrators to tell a story, each one bringing a very personal touch to it. // The Barbapapa family spends a day at the beach. Divided into 2 teams, the barbababies fight over a sandy peninsula.

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (Mystère et... boulette de viande) S4 (8/20)
programme.desc: «Mystère et... boulette de viande»When Crusher accidentally knocks a bottle of "grow spice" onto a meatball, it grows to an enormous size and rolls away! It's up to Blaze and Pickle to transform into robots and stop the meatball before it wrecks the entire town!

programme.title: Blaze et les Monster Machines (À vos marques, prêts, rugissez !) S3 (n°14)
programme.desc: «À vos marques, prêts, rugissez !»Blaze and Stripes transform into ferociously fast jungle cats to race in the Animal Island Championship! But to win, they'll have to beat Crusher disguised as a cheating cheetah. Can they claw their way to victory?

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Les éléphants apeurés / Le chanteur et les loups) S8 (n°7)
programme.desc: «Les éléphants apeurés / Le chanteur et les loups»A bee frightens some elephants in 'Pups Save The Hiding Elephants', then in 'Pups Save a Yodeler', Wingnut runs away from wolves and ends up trapped in a canyon. (S8, ep 7).

programme.title: Paw Patrol, la Pat'Patrouille (Un train fou dans le désert / Le parcours d'escalarbre) S8 (n°8)
programme.desc: «Un train fou dans le désert / Le parcours d'escalarbre»When the Dizzy Dust Express appears with no one aboard, the Paw Patrol must stop the runaway train and find the missing passengers. // Ms. Marjorie, Tilly Turbot, and Mayor Goodway get stranded in the treetops on their jungle zip-lining adventure.

programme.title: Deer Squad : Les Super-cerfs (Cirque Cosmique / Au fond du gouffre) S2 (n°18)
programme.desc: «Cirque Cosmique / Au fond du gouffre»Sir Steel's circus takes Lady Fluffpot out of this world, can the Deer Squad bring her back to earth safely? // Bobbi gets carried away while digging for ground nuts and puts the forest and its residents in real danger.
